room_title: Escape room "Trapped in the Bermuda Triangle" by Escape Countdown in Fort Myers
room_address: 12951 Metro Pkwy Suite 17 Fort Myers, FL 33966
room_description: While navigating the Bermuda seas, your navigation system lost all points of direction and your ship has crashed into a lone island! The Bermuda Triangle is looking to take victim - another lost traveler! You and your crew have a radio to help save you, but only have enough battery for 60 minutes! Can you find your coordinates and relay them to the rescue team to help save you before the battery dies and all hope is gone?
